snippet: Were Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin to serve four full terms as president, he would lengthen his term as Russia’s paramount leader to 24 years.
abstract: Russia's Prime Min Vladimir V Putin, who is likely to win a third presidential term, says that he might run for president for a fourth time in 2018, lengthening his term as Russia's paramount leader to 24 years.
lead_paragraph: Were Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin to serve four full terms as president, he would lengthen his term as Russia’s paramount leader to 24 years.

headline.seo: Putin Says He Might Run for President Again in 2018
headline.main: Putin Says He Might Seek a Fourth Term as President in 2018, ‘if Things Are Going Well’
headline.print_headline: Putin Says He Might Seek a Fourth Term as President in 2018, ‘if Things Are Going Well’
